title: arlikex [H4XING PROGRAM]
description:
Okay, are you really PISSED OFF on someone in your school? Or wanna mess with someone in your family?


Then you are right.


HowTo:
It&#039;s a very simple haxing program. Just install the program, using setup.exe.
Choose your directory, etc.

When the installation are done, then start "arlikex.exe" and start haxing.


Features:
- IP Changer. (You change your offers IP address all the time, it is not very nesescary but useful if your offer are a hoster)
- Spam messages. Write how many messages it will be spammed, and write what you wanna spam. You can write up to 3 messages. (e.g "hello, you got pwn3d" "hahaha" "n00b" x 5000.
- Remove important files. (files from SYSTEM32 directory, etc)
- Thiefable 4.2 (you can take games and stuff from him, do you like Battlefield? Then take it!)
- r0flmao 3.21 (when enables this, your offer will hear a stupid guy laugh, until he reboots his computer, then you can re-enable it. :D)
- LikeSmileys? 1.34 (Yeah? Do you like smileys? Enable this, your offer&#039;s computer will be attacked my some 100 smileys, sad smileys, happy smileys, evil smileys, yeah it all!
